text: The Sorcerer's Apprentice is a 2010 American fantasy adventure movie starring Nicolas Cage and Alfred Molina. The movie is named after The Sorcerer's Apprentice part in Disney's Fantasia ==Plot== Balthazar Blake (Nicolas Cage) is a master sorcerer in modern-day Manhattan trying to defend the city from his worst enemy, Maxim Horvath (Alfred Molina). Balthazar can not do it alone, so he recruits Dave Stutler (Jay Baruchel), a seemingly average guy who demonstrates hidden potential, as his protégé. Balthazar teaches him the art and science of magic, and together, they work to stop Horvath from freeing Morgan le Fay. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2010 adventure movies Category:2010 fantasy movies Category:2010s American adventure movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Jon Turteltaub
